Class OrderResource

  • java.lang.Object

 @RolesAllowed(value="CUSTOMER")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response add(java.lang.String body)
        REST endpoint to add an order into the system.
        Parameters:
        body - the body contains ClientId and quantity.
        Returns:
        whether or not the order is added.
